name: Us census archive
tagline: Archive of data published in US Decennial Census reports, with user-contributed digital content
body:
### Welcome to the Unofficial US Census Archive
This page hosts user-contributed resources, links, and data relating to the US Decennial Census. All data is free to use and distribute. If you like our work, pitch in!

### Census Data Explorer
1940 Census of Housing
Volume 2 Part 1 Table 8 ((xls)[https://github.com/delgadom/us_census_archive/blob/master/data/1940/1940_census_of_housing/coh_1940_v2_1_t8.xls])

### Analysis


### Authors and Contributors
Please feel free to contribute to this repository by adding new tables and analyses. This repo is maintained by @delgadom.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
